entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Public PGO config switch #70410
  • System.ExecutionEngineException crash when debugging (0x80131506) #70409
  • [MongoDB.Driver] some methods throw exception after native compiler #70400
  • NativeAOT testing integration #70395
  • RuntimeOptions-tfm net6.0 Stack Overflow #70393
  • TripleDES Encryption in .NET 6 failure #70392
    7.0.0
  • Vector3.Cross calculates wrong value #70391
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer - check allocation non free code during compilation #70387
  • Crypto exception on startup with self-signed cert in Windows container #70386
  • Stack overflow in crossgen2 #70385
  • [API Proposal]: `ProcessModule.Symbols()` #70380
  • [API Proposal]: `Process.Architecture` or `Process.Is64Bit` #70374
  • `Process.Modules` is unable to list 32-bit modules of a target process on Windows #70370
  • [API Proposal]: `Stream.Advance` & `Stream.AdvanceAsync` #70369
  • [wasm] Linker failure breaking rolling builds #70363
    7.0.0
  • Codespaces should include gh cli #70361
  • Secrets are not being read from k8s mounted folder - AddKeyPerFile #70411
  • [API Proposal]: Trim friendly Font ToLogFont/FromLogFont #70358
  • [QUIC] Throw if underlying OS does not support client certificates #70357
    Future
  • JIT: AssertProp propagates const vector back to loop body #70355
    8.0.0
  • Error named pipes client Logon Failure: the user has not been granted the requested logon type at this computer. #70354
  • Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom not Returning SocketFlags in NET6 #70353
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer should serialize tuples by default #70352
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: IsAssignableFrom cannot compare types #70351
  • SPMI CI runs need to surface context misses #70350
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op3Reg' on arm64 (crossgen) #70349
    7.0.0
  • .Net Core 3.1 code runs slower in .Net 6 #70348
  • Regressions in integer parsing #70376
  • Perf regressions in sorting #70373
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0 Application Framework .Net 4.8 Upgrade Issue #70344
  • Regressions in System.Formats.Tar.Tests.Perf_TarFile #70366
  • Regressions from vector constants change #70368
    7.0.0
  • Internal Error in .NET Runtime #70341
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate methods on primitives with null-condition operator. #70337
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(tree->AsCast()->gtCastType == m_tailcall->gtReturnType) && "Expected cast after tailcall to be no-op"' #70334
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid results/assertion errors with modulo ops #70333
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #70330
  • Configuration override has different behaviour when debugging vs normal #70326
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.NothingRevoked #70323
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp(offlineContext: False) #70322
    7.0.0
  • Add System.Diagnostics.EventLog to the shared runtime and reference packs. #70321
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates test failures #70320

Closed

  • Review workaround for Named mutex: Use flock instead of pthread process-shared mutex #65929
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `memory access out of bounds` in `System.Memory.Tests`/AOT/windows/v8 #70175
  • Implement INumber<T> for System.Numerics.BigInteger and System.Numerics.Complex #70404
  • IHostBuilder should support async delegate #36124
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Customizable IConfigurationRoot.GetDebugView() for hiding the value #60065
    7.0.0
  • Call to "File.AppendAllText()" function may not always work and may sometimes corrupt the file. #70247
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHost should be IAsyncDisposable #43027
    Future
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(m_block->bbNext == nullptr) || (m_block->bbNext->bbPrev == m_block)' during 'Update flow graph opt pass' #69938
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests timing out on Windows #69860
  • RyuJIT doesn't eliminate a jump to the next instruction #4326
    Future
  • Track removing workaround to not use pthread robust mutexes for named mutexes on arm32/arm64 Linux #69688
    8.0.0
  • Test failures in hashing on Browser #69806
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray #69728
    7.0.0
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking fixed-length markers never triggered #65532
    7.0.0
  • build-native.cmd expects "Program Files (x86)" to exist when running it in a 32-bit OS #29716
    Future
  • Add RIDs for arm64e #34121
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\localloc\\call\\call07_small\\call07_small.cmd #65943
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MultipartContent.cs constructor or public property to control usage of double quotes in boundary #68968
    7.0.0
  • System.Globalization.CultureInfo compatibility issues #70342
  • Failed test: JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\X86Base\\Pause_r\\Pause_r.cmd #62423
    7.0.0
  • Delete `doesFieldBelongToClass` #69900
    Future
  • Biginteger logarithm error #70359
  • DebuggerDisplay for System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch #65724
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.FijiTimeZoneTest #70274
  • The thread pool's global queue doesn't scale well on machines with a large processor count #67845
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Quic.MsQuicException on rolling build of runtime #69792
  • System.Text.Json doesn't serialize tuples correctly #68264
    7.0.0
  • .NET Core 3.1 integer performance 12% slower than .NET 4.8 #34414
    7.0.0
  • "HttpClient TryAddWithoutValidation" problem #69967
  • CI Failure: System.Memory tests failing with seg fault #68722
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\opt\Tailcall\TailcallVerifyWithPrefix\TailcallVerifyWithPrefix.cmd #69587
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.MetadataWithPerTypeAttributeContextTests.RoundTripCollectionsDictionary failing with Actual: 0001-01-01T00:00:00.0000000+00:00 #67948
  • String.IndexOf doesn't find the index if parameter is cast or converted from int #70335
  • Unhandled SECURITY_STATUS (0x80090016) in SecurityStatusAdapterPal results in InternalException #69828
    7.0.0
  • [Windows arm] JIT/stress/ABI/tailcall_d / do tests are non-deterministically failing several times a day #70042
    7.0.0
  • JIT ABI stress test: Assertions on Arm32 #68837
    7.0.0
  • ARM32 JIT: Assertion failed '!"NYI: odd sized struct in fgMorphMultiregStructArg"' during 'Morph - Global' #61168
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `.All` and `.Any()` for bool collections in System.Linq.Enumerable #69925
  • JIT: cloning invariant analysis seems oddly limited #70100
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/Matrix4x4_r/Matrix4x4_r.sh #69093
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector128/Vector128_ro/Vector128_ro.sh #66439
    7.0.0
  • Vector3.Cross calculates wrong value #64375
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `ArgumentNullException` in `System.Numerics.Tests.op_multiplyTest.RunMultiplyPositive` - Linux/AOT/v8 #70213
  • Unify cost computation for GT_LIST nodes #6622
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsSIMD(type)' #70260
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix3x2Tests.Matrix3x2CreateRotationCenterTest #70124
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: Compiler optimization assumption invalid: FAILED: pMgr != 0 #70259
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp more resilient to being slow #70413
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add basic testing infrastructure in NativeAOT (port from dotnet/linker) #70408
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Crossgen2 PDB generator #70407
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move analyzer and fixer tests into FuncionalTests project #70406
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Tweak NonBacktracking condition used to employ RegexFindOptimizations #70405
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • List other architectures in dotnet --info #70403
    area-Host
  • Enable IDE0074 (Use compound assignment) #70402
    area-Meta
  • JIT: add ability to order blocks in dump by bbNum or bbID #70399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete a zero-diff quirk and update `INDEX`-related comments #70398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove old macOS compatibility code for RSA decryption #70397
    area-System.Security
  • Add fake server test for Negotiate authentication. #70396
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Improve Stopwatch DebuggerDisplayAttribute test #70394
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Remove unneeded unconditional jumps for Arm/Arm64 #70389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-preview5] [wasm] [debugger] Removing usage of serilog #70383
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] [debugger] Removing usage of serilog #70382
    area-Build-mono
  • Detect inlining accurately and skip generating precode fixups for inlines that do not succeed #70379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Do not propagate some constants #70378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cloning based on loop invariant type tests #70377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Wasm] Add support for baseUrl and mainScriptPath #70375
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 6.0.7 #70372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove ActiveIssue on OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX #70367
    area-System.Runtime
  • Disable 2 FSW tests failing only on macOS 12 #70365
    area-System.IO
  • Remove some unnecessary regex NonBacktracking code #70364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes resource warning on a HW app #70356
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [custom_attrs] Use the image's ALC instead of the default one (#68266) #70346
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] OpenSslX509ChainProcessor: ignore NotSignatureValid on last element. #70343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, community-contribution, 6.0.7
  • Avoid unnecessary normalization for GT_RET_EXPR #70340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop normalizing managed calls in R2R #70339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix leaking mach ports & memory after task_threads() #70338
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement System.Buffers.Text.Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 for Arm64 #70336
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Increase precision and safety of the NonVersionableAttribute #70327
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Convert assert to exception for loading native libraries #70319
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Remove named mutex workaround for Linux arm/arm64 #70381
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: remove loop if `lpTop` becomes unreachable #70324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete a few dependencies on field sequences #69991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests test failures on windows #70328
    arch-wasm, test-bug, area-Build-mono
  • Clarify atomicity guarantees in ECMA-335 #70384
    area-Meta
  • Update shared code from linker #70204
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Keep members on Int128 and Half for testing #70332
  • Fix double to ulong conversions to handle NaN #70331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in WASM crypto worker #70185
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Add hot/cold splitting test job to jit-runtime-experimental #69922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • Remove complex marshalling support from crossgen2 #70183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix trimmability of various System.Runtime tests #70329
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Optimization for "~x + 1" to "-x" (#69003) #69600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable the pause intrinsic test for x86/x64 CoreCLR #70230
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Mop-up changes per Jakob's PR suggestions #70180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update testing-android.md #70362
    area-Meta
  • Add bool and uint to documentation for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70360
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • handle SECURITY_STATUS 0x80090016 #69942
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix TZ Tests #70309
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • NonBacktracking inner matching loop optimizations #70217
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT ARM32: Fix passing odd sized structs from arbitrary sources #70075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fold more `OBJ(ADDR(LCL))` patterns in multi-reg morphing #70207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete obsolete code from `gtSetMultiOpOrder` #70216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not use `LEA`s in HIR #69992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not retype SIMD nodes #70265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Always use portable tailcalling mechanism for delegate tailcalls #70269
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: broaden cloning invariant checks #70232
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix linker ref param warnings #70082
    area-Meta
  • [mono][wasm] Revert the gc_pin optimization changes. #70234
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Rename TarFormat to TarEntryFormat #70313
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check for ldobj. #70308
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add legs to build wasm with internal threads only and full threading enabled #68787
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Forbid creating layout-less `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #70170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update analyzer version and fix new findings #70157
    area-Meta
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on Windows #70316
  • Unpin locals #70264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating usages of `IntPtr`/`UIntPtr` to be the language keyword `nint`/`nuint` now that they are equivalent #70297
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0][iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70288
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.7
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle enums in box-unbox optimization #70167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PoC: support custom X509ChainPolicy in SslStream #69908
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add support for processing Unified TLS frames #69848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix SmtpClient reuse with SendAsync #70046
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fixed obsolete comment details on System.Convert #70257
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_SPLIT` codegen #70249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable WASM EH as an experiment. #70292
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Package validation and interface inheritance problem #25888
  • Unhandled System.IO.FileLoadException shows when dotnet format project #25879
  • MSB6004 Missing "ProgramW6432" environment variable on 32-bit systems #25887

Closed

  • "ProgramW6432" environment variable is missing on 32-bit systems #25895
  • NETSDK1095 failure when 'cross-compiling' using PublishReadyToRun #17524
  • PrepareForReadyToRunCompilation task fails on 5.0 #3661
    Discussion
  • SDK manpages bad-whatis-entry #25709

PullRequests

Created

  • Explain the Purpose of Dogfood in The Dev Guide #25905
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Description for Pre-Release Reinstallation Updates #25900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25899
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25898
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.107 #25891
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.421 #25890
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25781
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Roslyn version to 4.3.0-2.22302.14 #25894
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Update branding to 6.0.302 #25892
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25834
    Area-Workloads
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RID target from lower macOS to the latest one #25784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update man pages #25755

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Type extracting patterns #3050
  • [Proposal]: Attributes on Main for top level programs #5045
    Backlog
  • Proposal: "Closed" enum types #3179
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Records Feature: convert between primary constructor and traditional constructor #61749
  • IntelliSense variable name suggestions offered in wrong spot (32601.517.main) #61747

Closed

  • Raw string content continuation indent should match leading indentation of previous line #60946
    17.3
  • Can't edit `.sql` or `.jsx` files via the VS diff tool #61742
  • Intellisense for NuGet package name and version #61744
  • A change for natural type of a UTF-8 string literal to `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` breaks several IDE tests #61517
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Include IndentBlockFormattingRule in AddMissingImportsService #61761
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Filter out tracked document changes in semantic tokens handler #61760
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide an extensibility point for embedded language brace highlighting #61756
    Area-IDE
  • Update DartLab pipeline to use new agent template #61755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61754
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Add explanation of IDE design process and include template #61751
    Area-Compilers
  • Add experimental option to semantic snippet experience #61750
    Area-IDE
  • Highlight static local function use sites as static #61748
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed a small typo in docs #61743
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Remove obsolete comments referencing an issue. #61740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Check 'scoped' differences in overrides and interface implementations #61738
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61759
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use block indent inside raw strings #61753
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add ILegacyDocumentOptionsProvider to allow VS Mac to resolve editorconfig options #61746
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61752
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61734
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify nested lambda #61745
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Avoid delegate allocations for ImmutableArray<T>.Any #61729
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Prefer stack storage for highly-contended temporary array #61670
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Tweak UTF-8 string literal analyzer and code fix after language change #61650
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't bubble up linked token cancellation to the batching work queue #61739
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid double typechecks in simple code checks #61730
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61741
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • If-Modified-Since header is missing for most Accept header values #42082
  • Can't run Blazor wasm hosted solution from VS 2022 with a custom environment #42081
  • Perf improvement: https, json #42080
  • SPA template issues with Individual authentication when running in production #42072
  • Consider not excluding `.well-known/*` from publishing #42071
  • disable FileWatching for FileVersionProvider/Default IFileProvider #42070
    Backlog
  • `app.UseSpa` should serve `DefaultPageStaticFile` with `cache-control: no-cache` to avoid cache trap #42069
  • Build the Kestrel.Transport.Sockets nuget package #42067
  • HTTP/2: React to updated spec (RFC 9113) #42066

Closed

  • At random intervals the application fails to set RouteValues #41924
    .NET 7 Planning
  • IRequestCookieCollection.TryGetValue() causes "Possible null reference" even if if-statement and return is used #42032
  • `dotnet user-jwts` follow ups #41820
    7.0-preview6
  • [.NET 7] Blazor debug host does fails to start #41927
    7.0-preview6
  • Form fields in web pages in project templates appear squished together #40887
    7.0-preview6
  • ObjectGraphDataAnnotationsValidator #33247
    Backlog
  • Bitdefender Total Security detects a Trojan when viewing published Blazor WebAssembly as well as while publishing too #41063
  • Antiforgery token validation failed #42068
  • [Blazor WASM] Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild') #42065
  • Stackable Pages i.e. Multiple Pages on Top of Each Other Like MdiContainer In Winform #42041
  • Razor runtime compilation with dynamic assemblies fails #40377
    Discussions
  • Add HttpContext ot ITicketStore methods (CookieAuthenticationHandler) #41908
    Backlog
  • Signout doesn't redirect to redirect uri specified in authentication properties. #36934
    7.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Update project templates to replace DateTime with DateOnly #42084
  • Fix css formatting in Blazor Server/WASM template #42083
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Add `razor-compiler` cross-link on `issues` page #42076
    area-infrastructure
  • Identity UI: Input forms' `form-floating` broken styles fixed. #42075
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Clean up test retry list #42074
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Backport 41868 to release/6.0 #41870
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Handle spaces after request line #41823
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0] Backport branch mirror pipeline #41760
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.7 #42078
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Did the first task of issue #42016: removing the default address (https://localhost:5001) for https #42021
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix IRequestCookieCollection.TryGetValue() possible null reference #42033
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Localize strings in user-jwts tool #42061
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts, 7.0-preview6
  • Update branding to 3.1.27 #42077
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Update the cookies authentication handler to always honor AuthenticationProperties.RedirectUri #42039
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Identity UI: Tweak styles for floating identity forms #42056
    area-identity, 7.0-preview6
  • Add HttpContext to ITicketStore (#41908) #42063
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Retry on IIS startup failures #42062
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix line endings for SPA proxy script on MacOS #41821
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0] Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101

  • release/6.0 Quarantine all but pri 0 shadow copy test #41738

  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • [user-jwts] Read and generate secrets ID with SecretsManager #42006

  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to build MacCatalyst when a lib with native dependencies is referenced. #7829
  • Colors.DarkGray returns wrong value #7827
  • Sending e-mail works in Android but not in Windows #7826
  • Error DEP0700: Registration of the app failed #7825
  • FlexLayout exception #7824
  • In a ToolbarItems, if an item has no icon but just text, MAUIuses the icon from the previous page in the Navigation #7823
  • Layout Bounds not respected on Windows target #7822
  • MAUI : LogMessage are not showing up anywhere #7821
  • Updating WinUI properties via resources does not take effect #7820
    6.0-sr2
  • MAUI Templates are missing in VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7819
  • Crash on function invoking in a release mode (iOS), if a function was created from lambda expression #7815
  • Vertical scrolling not working for CarouselView and CustomLayouts #7814
  • TextToSpeech.GetLocalesAsync(); inconsistent values in Locale, #7813
  • Vertical scrolling in <ScrollView Orientation="Both"> not working #7811
  • Editor does not resize to full width in a ContentPage. #7810
  • DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged The active Window can not be detected. Ensure that you have called Init in your Application class. #7809
  • Project file MauiXaml node inconsistent #7808

Closed

  • Grid in a ContentView with a ControlTemplate with a ContentPresenter does not size #7805
    6.0-sr2
  • Update schema reference in ide.host.json files #7735
    6.0-sr2
  • Update .NET MAUI templates to support selecting the target framework version #7429
    6.0-sr1
  • WPF BlazorWebView TabStopOrder not working #2537
    6.0-sr2
  • No notification when custom properties change in compatibility renderer #7754
  • TemplatedView can't find handlers #7325
    6.0-sr2

PullRequests

Created

  • Update readme to include latest release blogpost #7831
  • Fix windows things #7830
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 #7817
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.4.1.1 to 1.4.2 #7816
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Use the SDK band in the rollback files #7828
    area/setup 🪄, 6.0-sr1
  • Use the new layout system in ContentPresenter #7807
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr1
  • BlazorWebView WPF tab navigation improvements #7742
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.0.3 to 1.1.0 #7788
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, 6.0-sr1
  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0-sr1
  • Return VER for PlatformView #7509
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr1
  • Fix TemplatedView #7771
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr1

Updated

  • Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #7514
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix GridLayoutManager Layout calculation #7712
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix SearchBar semantics #7802
    area/a11y, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Fix issue using gradients in Button with Corner Radius #7666
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
